entry.title: HackTheBox - Pennyworth
entry.summary: Description Hello l33ts, I hope you are doing well. Today we are going to look at Pennyworth from HackTheBox. Enumeration nmap We start a nmap scan using the following command: sudo nmap -sC -sV -T4 {target_IP}. -sC: run all the default scripts. -sV: Find the version of services running on the target. -T4: Aggressive scan to provide faster results. Nma...

entry.title: HackTheBox - Responder
